FREE UPDATE - MR MODE NOW AVAILABLE!
The fresh and definitive version of the popular rhythm game is here! All the contents you love from the classic VR mode, plus the newest and most innovative experience to enjoy OhShape: the new MR mode! Transform your own room in your dance floor. Free for OhShape players!

OhShape is a rhythm game offering a unique way of moving your whole body. Dodge obstacles, punch walls, and make fun poses to get through each map. Play with the coins and be the star of your own show!
